The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
A closed mouth catches no flies.
A smile is your passport into the hearts of others.
A clear conscience is usually the sign of a bad memory.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
Your success will astonish everyone.
All things are difficult before they are easy.
A friend is a present you give yourself.
You will be successful through innovation and determination.
A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
Your kindness will lead you to success.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Do not fear what you don't know.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Good things come to those who wait.
You will be rewarded for being a good listener.
You will find happiness with a new perspective.
Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
Your future is as bright as your faith.
You will receive a gift of high value.
The road to success is always under construction.
You will soon embark on a new and exciting adventure.
Success is a journey, not a destination.
A kind word will keep someone warm for years.
You will soon witness a miracle.
You will overcome difficult times with ease.
Your hard work will soon pay off.
